topics.body: Wait so when did Team Four Star finally start living together?
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548bdbe86368722ede200500#post_548bdbe86368722ede200500

They're not living together strictly speaking.

Kaiser and Lani live in the same condo over in Texas, but Taka is still living in Canada and came to visit them over in November

topics.body:
"JJ's Medical Fund":http://www.gofundme.com/isqgrw
I think this may be the reason why he hasn't been producing art as much as before.

Even if you're not a Pony fan anymore. This guy has helped build a community that brought all of us together here today. The least we can do is help him.

topics.body: "I sincerely hope that the commenters and possibly the poet gets the memo that telling someone to kill themselves is the most idle threat ever. It doesn't take much time or effort to type 'kill yourself,faggot' to a random stranger. You might even argue that that's what encouraging trolls; that they get so worked up over some guy they don't even know and that's what keeps them running. Also, anyone who still believe that trolls and cyberbullies are interchangeable and that those who think otherwise are evil should consider whether they're putting up a false dichotomy against people who don't even know what they're talking about. Not to mention that it's kinda hypocritical to automatically brand all trolls as sociopathic, non-human harbingers of evil who don't understand that people have emotions, thoughts, a sense of individuality and a life.":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=670if6Etx0o
